author: JDB from maine
title: Lying corrupt company
review: Lie to me once and you‚Äôre out. Setup Spectrum after we discussed in EXACT detail the arrangement I wanted to accommodate my second home being there sometimes and away other times. Chose lying corrupt Spectrum because they happily deceived me into signing up only to later tell me the temporary service suspensions didn‚Äôt work the way I was lied to. Again nothing was unclear at all - I made sure to give specific details and they deliberately lied to me. I am done for life and will leave this review in a few places. Such short sighted corrupt jerks. You should be thoroughly ashamed. Disgusting. You never think about the long term consequences or lifetime value of a customer before lying to them like this? All calls are recorded for quality control. Can all calls be sent to the FTC so they can evaluate your dishonesty?

author: JohnEJeep
title: Bad service
review:
If you‚Äôre contemplating using Spectrum, don‚Äôt. If you‚Äôre here because you just signed up with Spectrum, get out while you can! Almost daily service outages that last multiple hours, day or night. Once you‚Äôre past that initial sign-up promo price, the cost is $85 a month for download speeds of 150-170Mbps. (They advertise triple that) No adjustments on your bill for all the outages or for not delivering the speeds they advertise.
A class action lawsuit (sorry - I mean yet another class action lawsuit) against Spectrum wouldn‚Äôt surprise me at all.

author: Fiddlestix36
title: Forced to use app
review: I was sent a new modem to replace my old one. The instructions required this app to be downloaded. I was able to install the new modem with the app, but it stopped functioning after that. When I open the app, the screen is white. One time it opened but everything was frozen. Deleted.

author: God's servant 43
title: My experience with Spectrum
review: Spectrum is a great home internet provider! I have only one complaint and that is once a week for the month I‚Äôve had service with them I have to unplug and restart my modem and router and wait about 10 minutes for everything to load up and get back to working in proper fashion. Other than that I have no issues and the people I‚Äôve talked to on customer service a couple of times have been super friendly and knowledgeable and able to answer all my inquiries to satisfaction. I only wish I wasn‚Äôt locked into cricket on my phone plan for 6 months bcz spectrums bundle of home internet and phone service is way more affordable than my phone plan with one company and internet thru another.
